generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and tram tracks, which is designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There is a sidewalk on the right side of the road, separated from the road by a curb, and it appears to be designated for pedestrians.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including structures with scaffolding on the left and commercial storefronts on the right.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street, particularly on the right side and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing as a clear blue with some clouds.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the street.
- car: A black car is visible on the left side of the road, driving in the same direction as the camera.
- bus: A tram (a type of bus for public transport on rails) is visible in the center of the road, moving towards the camera.
- train: The tram is a type of train on rails, which is visible in the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the sidewalk, including those supporting traffic signs and possibly streetlights.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign (possibly a "No Stopping" sign) is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- motorcycle: No motorcycle is visible in the image.
- bicycle: No bicycle is visible in the image.
- truck: No truck is visible in the image.
- terrain: No terrain (grass, soil, sand) is visible in the image.
